abstract: The man is accused of sexually assaulting a woman in May; additional police lineups are being conducted.
snippet: The man is accused of sexually assaulting a woman in May; additional police lineups are being conducted.
lead_paragraph: 11:18 p.m. | Updated A Queens man was charged on Tuesday in connection with at least one in a string of 20 sexual assaults in Brooklyn since March, the police said.

headline.main: Second Suspect Charged in Sex-Attack Pattern
